description: Creamy vanilla ice-cream and mango bubble tea combine to make an eye-catching, deliciously satisfying ice-cream float. Try this quick and easy drink today.
name: Mango Bubble Tea Float Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Chatime mango iced tea bubble tea kit

recipeInstructions.text: Empty one instant tea sachet into a small heatproof bowl or jug. Add 100ml boiling water and stir until dissolved. Place 1 cup crushed ice in a 300ml serving glass. Pour over tea mixture and stir to cool.
Add ice-cream and top with drained popping pearls from kit. Serve.
